name: cursor-mcp-tool
description: Personal MCP Server for opening Cursor IDE

scripts.copy-sdk: shx mkdir -p sdk && shx cp -r typescript-sdk-main/dist/* sdk/
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && cd typescript-sdk-main && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && npm run copy-sdk
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
